resourceTypeAttributes.description: Amount of IO waiting in the queue to be executed. High IO, coupled with high latency, impacts performance

resourceTypeAttributes.description: Optimal Consumer Provider ratio with committed projects

Guest|Page Out Rate per second
resourceTypeAttributes.description: The rate at which memory pages are paged out. An unexpected high value could indicate Guest OS is under memory pressure. It's a capacity, not performance metric.

resourceTypeAttributes.description: Amount of memory that can be used by the virtual machine memory control
